text:
Fixed in 2.0RC1. Checked with Excel 2002, re-written file opens perfectly. 

(BTW, dont use cell.setCellType(HSSFCell.CELL_TYPE_STRING) on a pre-existing
cell.. It'll throw up)
creator: avik@apache.org
